import { Meta, Story, Canvas } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import { DateSelect } from './DateSelect';

<Meta title="Components/Content/DateSelect" component={DateSelect} />

# DateSelect

The `DateSelect` component is used to select a date and time using a Material-UI `TextField`.

## Usage

```jsx
import { DateSelect } from './DateSelect';

<DateSelect />
```

## Props

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PROPS) -->
| Name | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `defaultValue` | `string` | `{ defaultDateAndTime }` | The default date and time value in the format of "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm" |
| `InputLabelProps` | `object` | `{ shrink: true }` | Props applied to the `InputLabel` element. |
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

## Examples

<Canvas>
  <Story
   name="Default"
   args={{
        label: 'Seleccione fecha',
        defaultDateAndTime: '2023-05-24T10:30',
   }}
   >
    {({label, defaultDateAndTime}) => (
        <DateSelect 
            label={label}
            defaultDateAndTime={defaultDateAndTime}
        />
    )}
  </Story>
</Canvas>
